Instruction: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit. Grease an 8x8-inch square baking pan.

Combine 1/2 cup of brown sugar and 1 cup of flour in a medium bowl. Mix in the melted margarine and vanilla until thoroughly combined. Press the mixture into the bottom of the greased 8x8 inch square baking pan.

Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes. While the crust is baking, beat eggs until light and foamy in a medium bowl. Combine brown sugar, flour, baking powder, and salt; add to the eggs. Stir in walnuts and coconut. Pour the mixture over the crust and bake.
Bake for an additional 15 minutes in the preheated oven until firm. After cooling, cut into squares and dust with powdered sugar.
